name: Gift Center (Notion Template)
description: Spend less time buying presents for the ones you love and more time being present with your loved ones!You don’t need to reinvent the wheel. I’ve done everything to make your gift-giving process both fun and effortless. Get rid of the spreadsheet, handwritten memos, and random notes on your phone. Enjoy your holiday. Perfect for your Christmas, birthday, or any event.What’s Included: Track unlimited people Record both the gift you give or receive Organize gifts by category, status, & price K
features: Trackunlimitedpeople; Record both the gift yougiveorreceive; Organize gifts bycategory, status, & price; Keep yourwishlistand share it with others!; Keep track of what you are getting for yourfriends/family; Manage your budget with thesummary of the total spent
